subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson holed a critical 7-foot putt for par on the final hole Saturday to cling to a one-stroke lead over Jeff Quinney at the Northern Trust Open at Riviera Country Club.
snippet: Phil Mickelson holed a critical 7-foot putt for par on the final hole Saturday to cling to a one-stroke lead over Jeff Quinney at the Northern Trust Open at Riviera Country Club.
